summary: WHEN I HAVE AN OIL CHANGE, THE DEALER (2 OF THEM) NOTIFY ME THAT I HAVE A LEAK IN MY REAR SHOCK ABSORBERS.  I HAVE REPLACED THE PASSENGER SIDE TWICE AND NOW THEY TELL ME MY DRIVERS SIDE IS LEAKING.  THE VEHICLE JUST WENT OUT OF WARRANTY, BUT THERE IS A PROBLEM WITH THE REAR SHOCKS.  I HAVE NEVER EXPERIENCE A REAR SHOCK LEAK AS LONG AS I HAVE OWNED A VEHICLE.  NOW, BASICALLY, EVERY TIME I HAVE AN OIL CHANGE AND CHECK, THEY INFORM ME OF A LEAKAGE.
